fields.Title: Idaho Youth Ranch (IYR) Human Resources Committee Learning and Development Recommendations
fields.Outlet (if applicable): Submitted to Task Force Chair and IYR Leadership
fields.Description/Abstract:
Describes efforts to develop the IYR leadership philosophy, in addition to recommendations answering three questions:

Question # 1: What should be the structure, organization, responsibilities, 
and skillsets of the IYR training department?
Question 2: How can IYR hire and train as many as 100 new positions 
for new residential treatment program? What other infrastructure development 
will be required?
Question 3: What training should IYR provide to all employees to foster 
personal/professional growth?
Question 4: How does IYR create an effective training plan process in which 
each position has a proscribed training plan that is consistently followed?
